name: Donald Trumpy
description:
Follow the below ig to get a neat surprise!

IG: Moisesesg

BRAND NEW GAME FOR ANY #ANTITRUMP OR #NOTTRUMP2016.
WITH A SECRET SURPRISE!!!
It is a thrilling version of Donald Trump flying through flames trying to collect money and survive.
DONT MISS OUT ON IT.
You, as the player can decide the fate of Trump. He can rank up points and keep moving forward or fall into the pits. This is suppose to represent a fun , light game.
No insult intended. Please download and enjoy.
I HAVE TO SAY IT IS MOST LIKELY THE BEST TRUMP APP OUT THERE.
DONT MISS OUT ON THIS ONE

What are you waiting for click download, you wont regret.
